Cyberdeck (Excellent).name: サイバーデッキ(高品質)

Cyberdeck (Poor).name: サイバーデッキ(低品質)

Battleglove.name: バトルグローブ
Battleglove.description: An exotic heavy gauntlet, that covers your hand and forearm. Provides three option slots. Refer to the full item description on pg. 347.

Smart Glasses.name: スマート・グラス
Smart Glasses.description: Eyewear with two options slots for cybereye options.

Agent.name: エージェント
Agent.description: AI Smartphone. +2 Library Search, +2 Wardrobe & Style depending on circumstance.

Anti-Smog Breathing Mask.name: 対スモッグ呼吸マスク

Audio Recorder.name: オーディオ・レコーダー
Audio Recorder.description: Record 24h of audio on a memory Chip.

Auto Level Dampening Ear Protectors.name: 自動制音イヤー・プロテクター

Braindance Viewer.name: ブレインダンス・ビューア

Cryopump.name: クリオポンプ
Cryopump.description: Briefcase used for hooking up a wounded person. Places them in stasis.

Cryotank.name: クリオタンク
Cryotank.description: Holds a fully-sized human, heals injuries faster than normal.

Drum Synthesizer.name: ドラム・シンセサイザー
Drum Synthesizer.description: Makes drum sounds when connected to amplifier.

Electric Guitar/Other Instrument.name: エレキギター/その他の楽器
Electric Guitar/Other Instrument.description: Musical instrument. Electric instruments requires an amplifier.

Flashlight.name: 懐中電灯
Flashlight.description: 10h of light on a single charge. 100m/yd range.

Linear Frame β (Beta).name: リニア・フレームβ(ベータ)
Linear Frame β (Beta).description: Exoskeleton. Requires 2 Interface Plugs. Increases BODY to 14 while plugged in. No changes to your HP or Deathsave.

Linear Frame ∑ (Sigma).name: リニア・フレーム∑(シグマ)
Linear Frame ∑ (Sigma).description: Exoskeleton. Requires 1 Interface Plug. Increases BODY to 12 while plugged in. No changes to your HP or Deathsave.

Personal CarePak.name: パーソナル・ケアパック

Radio Scanner/Music Player.name: 通信スキャナー/音楽プレーヤー

Scrambler/Descrambler.name: スクランブラー/ディスクランブラー

Tracer Button.name: 追跡子
Tracer Button.description: Can be tracked from up to a mile away with a homing tracer.

Vial of Biotoxin.name: バイオトキシンの小瓶
Vial of Biotoxin.description: 3d6 damage unless Resist Torture/Drugs. Armor does not apply.

Vial of Poison.name: 毒の小瓶
Vial of Poison.description: 2d6 damage unless Resist Torture/Drugs. Armor does not apply.

Virtuality Goggles.name: バーチャリティ・ゴーグル
